title: `/outputs/tools/smoke_test.py` plus a scripted runner that captures environment diagnostics (Python version, cwd, permissions, disk space) and writes a human-readable incident report to `/outputs/qa/incidents/<timestamp>_container_lost.md` alongside raw logs.
mission: Create `/outputs/tools/smoke_test.py` plus a scripted runner that captures environment diagnostics (Python version, cwd, permissions, disk space) and writes a human-readable incident report to `/outputs/qa/incidents/<timestamp>_container_lost.md` alongside raw logs.
